org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.physical.text

Interface TextObject

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttributeContainer, TextContent, TextContentVariants
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Glyph, LowLevelTextObject, TextLine, TextRegion, Word

    public interface TextObject
extends TextContentVariants
    Interface for objects with text content (e.g. text region, word, ...).
    Author:
    clc

      • isBold

        java.lang.Boolean isBold()
        Bold text?
        Returns:
        true for bold text, false for normal text, or null if not set.
